markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bralani Breath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2021)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 74 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell (add 1 action)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Bralani breath_ is a species of mint with small, green flowers, said to grow on battlefields where the opposing sides were equally matched. Sprigs of the flowers blow gently in a breeze of their own creation. If you cast [_mage armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=176) using _bralani breath_, you release a small blast of concussive air in an emanation of a size that depends on the catalyst's type. Some unattended objects are pushed away from you. Large or smaller creatures must succeed at a Fortitude save equal to your spell save DC or be [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the same distance away from you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bralani Breath
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 74 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 11 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Objects of 1 Bulk or less and creatures that fail the save are pushed 5 feet.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bralani Breath (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 74 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 110 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Objects of 1 Bulk or less and creatures that fail the save are pushed 10 feet. Objects of up to 2 Bulk are pushed 5 feet, and Huge creatures must succeed at the save or be pushed 5 feet.
name: Bralani Breath
